title: Correlative light and X-ray tomography jointly unveil the critical role of connexin43 channels on inflammation-induced cellular ultrastructural alterations
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Chidinma Adanna Okolo, Jack Jonathan Maran, Amy Watts, Jaime Maripillan, Maria Harkiolaki, Agustín D. Martínez, Colin R. Green, Odunayo Omolola Mugisho
